com.psddev.dari.util

Class TypeDefinition<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.psddev.dari.util.TypeDefinition<T>

  • public class TypeDefinition<T>
extends Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected TypeDefinition(Type type)
      Creates an instance based on the given type.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<Field> getAllFields()
      Returns an unmodifiable list of all the fields.
      Map<String,Method> getAllGetters()
      Returns an unmodifiable map of all the getters (public non-static methods that have no parameters and return a value) with the normalized names as keys.
      List<Method> getAllMethods()
      Returns an unmodifiable list of all the methods.
      Map<String,List<Field>> getAllSerializableFields()
      Returns an unmodifiable map of all the serializable (non-static and non-transient) fields with the normalized names as keys.
      Map<String,Method> getAllSetters()
      Returns an unmodifiable map of all the setters (public non-static methods that take one parameter and doesn't return anything) with the normalized names as keys.
      List<Class<? super T>> getAssignableClasses()
      Returns an unmodifiable list of all the classes that can be assigned from this one with the most specific match (itself) first.
      Set<Class<?>> getAssignableClassesAndInterfaces()
      Returns an unmodifiable set of all classes and interfaces that are either the same as, or is a super class or super interface of, this type.
      Constructor<T> getConstructor(Class<?>... parameterClasses)
      Returns the constructor that can be called with the given array of parameterClasses.
      List<Constructor<T>> getConstructors()
      Returns an unmodifiable list of all the constructors.
      Field getField(String name)
      Returns the first field with the given name.
      static <T> TypeDefinition<T> getInstance(Class<T> objectClass)
      Returns an instance based on the given objectClass.
      static TypeDefinition<?> getInstance(Type type)
      Returns an instance based on the given type.
      static <T> TypeDefinition<T> getInstance(TypeReference<T> typeReference)
      Returns an instance based on the given typeReference.
      Class<T> getObjectClass()
      Returns the defintion's Class, not including any Generic Parameters it knows about ex.
      Type getType()
      Returns the defintion's Type, including any Generic Parameters it knows about ex.
      T newInstance()
      Creates a new instance.

      • getType

        public Type getType()
        Returns the defintion's Type, including any Generic Parameters it knows about ex. TypeDefinition.getInstance(new TypeReference>() { }).getType(); // List A TypeReference needs to be provided to getInstance in order for the Parameterized type information to be retained (type erasure)

      • getObjectClass

        public Class<T> getObjectClass()
        Returns the defintion's Class, not including any Generic Parameters it knows about ex. TypeDefinition.getInstance(new TypeReference>() { }).getObjectClass(); // List

      • getAssignableClasses

        public List<Class<? super T>> getAssignableClasses()
        Returns an unmodifiable list of all the classes that can be assigned from this one with the most specific match (itself) first.

      • getAssignableClassesAndInterfaces

        public Set<Class<?>> getAssignableClassesAndInterfaces()
        Returns an unmodifiable set of all classes and interfaces that are either the same as, or is a super class or super interface of, this type.

      • getAllFields

        public List<Field> getAllFields()
        Returns an unmodifiable list of all the fields.

      • getAllSerializableFields

        public Map<String,List<Field>> getAllSerializableFields()
        Returns an unmodifiable map of all the serializable (non-static and non-transient) fields with the normalized names as keys.

        Returns the first field with the given name.

      • getAllSetters

        public Map<String,Method> getAllSetters()
        Returns an unmodifiable map of all the setters (public non-static methods that take one parameter and doesn't return anything) with the normalized names as keys.
